summary: A unit test suite that checks the correctness of the helper utilities used to choose the appropriate array module (CPU or GPU) for SciPy special functions based on the provided input arrays and parameters.
business_intent: Validate that the array‑module selection logic works reliably, guaranteeing that SciPy special operations are dispatched to the correct backend (NumPy or CuPy) and thus supporting accurate and performant GPU‑accelerated computations.
